relevant_findings.Abdomen: Obese, diffusely tender to palpation with involuntary guarding, palpable umbilical bulge with mild overlying erythema that is TTP but reducible, reducible epigastric bulge that is non-tender. Well-healed right paramedian incision.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant worsening of abdominal pain noted; previous symptoms showed partial resolution before escalation.
